item.title: Michelle Williams’ ‘Dawson’s Creek’ Character Was Mercilessly Slut-Shamed. 22 Years Later, She Embraced Sex-Positivity in ‘Dying for Sex’: ‘We’ve Moved On From That Kind of Language’
item.description: When Michelle Williams hears about a new role, she makes up her mind pretty fast, one way or another. “It’s really just an instinct, and it happens immediately without my consent or conversation
